segments.text: I see the water pouring over the sink, and it’s making me so frustrated.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s going to ruin the floor if she doesn’t turn off the faucet soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies, and she’s completely missing it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool like it’s nothing, and it’s driving me crazy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, like this is all fine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how careless everyone is being right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just going to ruin everything, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone should really step in and fix this before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just a mess, and it’s making me so annoyed.
segments.speaker: PAR
